General.Name: Boa Concept SA
General.Description: BOA Concept SAS designs, manufactures, and markets solutions to intralogistics in France. The company offers robotic storage system, modular conveyors, and weighing systems, as well as offers technical solutions to trace loaded products. It also offers conveyors for heavy loads, wrapping and strapping solutions, and security systems. In addition, the company offers BOA Drive, a warehouse management software and rents out conveyor as a service mechanism. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Saint-Etienne, France.
